sentences: Njena Surae Jarvis, better known by her stage name Njena Reddd Foxxx, is an American rapper, based in Brooklyn, New York.

sentences: Originally from Washington, D.C., Jarvis moved to New York in 2000.

sentences: Before entering the world of rap, Jarvis was a full-time student at Cooper Union.

sentences: Jarvis' first experience with rap was on her best friend Ojay Morgan's 2012 single "Ima Read".

sentences: The song was recorded in one night, directly into a computer microphone, and hasn't been re-recorded since.
section: == Life and career == | === 2011-2012: Career Beginnings and "Ima Read" ===

sentences: On January 18, 2012, the song manifested into a music video directed by Ruben XYZ and quickly became a viral underground sensation.

sentences: In Spring of 2013, Jarvis and Katz opened twice for Die Antwoord and toured European festivals through to the end of Summer.

sentences: The duo later went on to open for the British leg of Azealia Banks's Fantasea tour in late 2012.

sentences: "Ima read" also became the soundtrack for Rick Owens' and Alex Mattsson's Fall-Winter 2012/2013 and Fall-Winter 2013 collections, respectively.

sentences: Following the unexpected success of "Ima Read", Jarvis began penning several songs under her Reddd Foxxx persona, releasing them periodically on her SoundCloud account.
section: == Life and career == | === 2013-present: Solo work and Needful Things ===

sentences: Jarvis' first solo song, "Silly Bitch", was released as a promotional single off her debut mixtape Class President, which has yet to be released.
section: == Life and career == | === 2013-present: Solo work and Needful Things ===

sentences: In September 2013, Jarvis was featured in a short film, modeling for British designer Kitty Joseph in association with Absolut Vodka.
section: == Life and career == | === 2013-present: Solo work and Needful Things ===

sentences: Jarvis' latest single "Watercolour" is used throughout the film.
section: == Life and career == | === 2013-present: Solo work and Needful Things ===

sentences: On December 15, 2013, Jarvis released her highly anticipated debut EP Needful Things, in collaboration with London-based producer Jepordise, to rave reviews.
section: == Life and career == | === 2013-present: Solo work and Needful Things ===

sentences: Jarvis is expected to release her first full-length mixtape The Wiz, which samples all of the songs featured in the 1978 feature film The Wiz, sometime later this year.
